sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato},
		dateOfETL
	)) ~> sink
